if(GameData.plotVars.SAVIOURS_CH3 == null)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bartholio",model:"bartholio",x:11,y:6,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"LIGHT",conv:"c_Saviours"});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Vennie",model:"vennie",x:11,y:5,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"AIR",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Aalia",model:"aalia",x:11,y:4,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"LIGHT",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bernard",model:"bernard",x:11,y:3,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"DARK",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:11,y:14,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      _root.playMusic("Saviours");
      _root.freeze = true;
      TempVars.CUTSCENE = true;
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,-3]],"PC",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_Saviours","Bartholio"]],"Bartholio",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Vennie",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Aalia",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Bernard",true);
   }});
}
